verses.text: \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w turned|strong="H7725"\w* \w myself|strong="H0589"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w other|strong="H3605"\w* \w things|strong="H3605"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w oppressions|strong="H6217"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w under|strong="H8478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sun|strong="H8121"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w tears|strong="H1832"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* innocent, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w had|strong="H0834"\w* \w no|strong="H0369"\w* \w comforter|strong="H5162"\w*; \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w were|strong="H0834"\w* \w not|strong="H0369"\w* \w able|strong="H3027"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* resist \w their|strong="H3605"\w* violence, being destitute \w of|strong="H3027"\w* help \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4191"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* praised \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w dead|strong="H4191"\w* \w rather|strong="H4480"\w* \w than|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w living|strong="H2416"\w*:

\w And|strong="H7200"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* judged \w him|strong="H0853"\w* happier \w than|strong="H3808"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w both|strong="H8147"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w yet|strong="H3808"\w* \w born|strong="H3808"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* hath \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* evils \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w under|strong="H8478"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w sun|strong="H8121"\w*.

Again \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w considered|strong="H7200"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* labours \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w*, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* remarked \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* industries \w are|strong="H0376"\w* \w exposed|strong="H7200"\w* \w to|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w envy|strong="H7068"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* neighhour: \w so|strong="H1571"\w* \w in|strong="H0376"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w also|strong="H1571"\w* \w there|strong="H2088"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w vanity|strong="H1892"\w*, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* fruitless care.

\w The|strong="H0853"\w* \w fool|strong="H3684"\w* foldeth \w his|strong="H3027"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* together, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* eateth \w his|strong="H3027"\w* own \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*, saying:

\w Better|strong="H2896"\w* \w is|strong="H7307"\w* \w a|strong="H7307"\w* handful \w with|strong="H3709"\w* rest, \w than|strong="H2896"\w* both \w hands|strong="H3709"\w* \w full|strong="H4393"\w* \w with|strong="H3709"\w* labour, \w and|strong="H5999"\w* vexation \w of|strong="H7307"\w* \w mind|strong="H7307"\w*.
Considering \w I|strong="H0589"\w* found also \w another|strong="H1892"\w* \w vanity|strong="H1892"\w* \w under|strong="H8478"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w sun|strong="H8121"\w*:

\w There|strong="H0369"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* hath \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H2088"\w* \w second|strong="H8145"\w*, \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w child|strong="H1121"\w*, \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w brother|strong="H0251"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w yet|strong="H1571"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* ceaseth \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H0369"\w* labour, \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w are|strong="H5869"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w satisfied|strong="H7646"\w* \w with|strong="H7646"\w* \w riches|strong="H6239"\w*, \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* doth \w he|strong="H1931"\w* reflect, saying: \w For|strong="H3605"\w* \w whom|strong="H4310"\w* \w do|strong="H0589"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* labour, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* defraud \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w things|strong="H3605"\w*? \w in|strong="H5315"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w also|strong="H1571"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w vanity|strong="H1892"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H2088"\w* grievous vexation.

\w It|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w better|strong="H2896"\w* \w therefore|strong="H0834"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* should \w be|strong="H4480"\w* \w together|strong="H0259"\w*, \w than|strong="H4480"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w*: \w for|strong="H0259"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* advantage \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w their|strong="H1992"\w* society:

\w If|strong="H0518"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H0369"\w* \w be|strong="H0369"\w* supported \w by|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w other|strong="H0259"\w*: \w woe|strong="H0337"\w* \w to|strong="H0369"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w alone|strong="H0259"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* falleth, \w he|strong="H3588"\w* hath \w none|strong="H0369"\w* \w to|strong="H0369"\w* \w lift|strong="H6965"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w*.

\w And|strong="H7901"\w* \w if|strong="H0518"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w lie|strong="H7901"\w* \w together|strong="H0259"\w*, \w they|strong="H0518"\w* \w shall|strong="H1571"\w* \w warm|strong="H2552"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w another|strong="H0259"\w*: \w how|strong="H0349"\w* \w shall|strong="H1571"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w alone|strong="H0259"\w* \w be|strong="H1571"\w* \w warmed|strong="H2552"\w*?

\w And|strong="H5975"\w* \w if|strong="H0518"\w* \w a|strong="H0518"\w* \w man|strong="H0259"\w* \w prevail|strong="H5975"\w* \w against|strong="H5048"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w*, \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w withstand|strong="H5975"\w* \w him|strong="H5975"\w*: \w a|strong="H0518"\w* threefold \w cord|strong="H2339"\w* \w is|strong="H0259"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* easily \w broken|strong="H5423"\w*.

\w Better|strong="H2896"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w a|strong="H0834"\w* \w child|strong="H3206"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w poor|strong="H4542"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w wise|strong="H2450"\w*, \w than|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H0834"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w old|strong="H2205"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w foolish|strong="H3684"\w*, \w who|strong="H0834"\w* knoweth \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H4428"\w* foresee \w for|strong="H3045"\w* hereafter.

\w Because|strong="H3588"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w prison|strong="H1004"\w* \w and|strong="H1004"\w* chains \w sometimes|strong="H7326"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w man|strong="H7326"\w* cometh \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H3205"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4438"\w*: \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w another|strong="H1571"\w* \w born|strong="H3205"\w* \w king|strong="H4427"\w* \w is|strong="H1571"\w* consumed \w with|strong="H1004"\w* poverty.

\w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w men|strong="H3206"\w* \w living|strong="H2416"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w walk|strong="H1980"\w* \w under|strong="H8478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sun|strong="H8121"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w second|strong="H8145"\w* \w young|strong="H3206"\w* \w man|strong="H3605"\w*, \w who|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H0834"\w* \w rise|strong="H5975"\w* \w up|strong="H7200"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w place|strong="H8478"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* number \w of|strong="H7307"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w of|strong="H7307"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w were|strong="H0834"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* infinite: \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w come|strong="H1961"\w* \w afterwards|strong="H0314"\w*, \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w rejoice|strong="H8055"\w* \w in|strong="H8055"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*: \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w also|strong="H1571"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w vanity|strong="H1892"\w*, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* vexation \w of|strong="H7307"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w*.

\w Keep|strong="H8104"\w* thy \w foot|strong="H7272"\w*, \w when|strong="H3588"\w* thou goest \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* draw nigh \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w*. \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w much|strong="H0834"\w* better \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w obedience|strong="H8085"\w*, \w than|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* victims \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w fools|strong="H3684"\w*, \w who|strong="H0834"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w not|strong="H0369"\w* \w what|strong="H0834"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w*.
